heroBanner.title: OCP Global Summit
heroBanner.subTitle: The 2021 event has concluded.
heroBanner.date: Registrants can access content here via video on demand.

registration_in_person_disclaimer:
OCP will follow all county, state and federal rules and regulations regarding travel and meetings at the time of the 2021 OCP Global Summit.  By clicking “Accept” below, you acknowledge and take responsibility for adhering to any and all travel and public participation regulations.  

Please visit the San Jose Convention Center travel webpage or reference the OCP Health & Safety website to see the latest updates regarding travel and meeting requirements. 

OCP, FNTECH, and Team San Jose are not responsible for any expenses incurred should an attendee be denied entry into the country, state, or event, including but not limited to: airfare, hotel, meals, and event registration fees. More information can be found the OCP travel page here.
